mapper.select: SELECT A.custno as custno, A.custname as custname, case when grade='A' then 'VIP' when grade='B' then '일반' when grade='C' then '직원' ELSE '기타' END AS grade, SUM(price) as price FROM membertbl A, moneytbl B WHERE A.custno = B.custno GROUP BY A.custno, A.custname, A.grade ORDER BY price DESC
